sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
[The instruction of a Christian man, in vertue and honestie.]. Hoper, R.
[6+], 136 [i.e. 146], [4] p.
H. Bynneman, [London : 1580?]
R. Hoper's name from leaf A3r. Title from caption title, leaf A6r. Imprint from STC. Running title reads: Of a vertuous or honest life. With an index. Page numbers 71-146 misnumbered 61-136 in page numbering. Identified as STC 14106a on UMI microfilm. Imperfect; lacks all before leaf A3. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
